results.name: Multiplicative with a(p^e) = 2^A000041(e).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Index entries for sequences computed from exponents in factorization of n
xref: Differs from A318474 for the first time at n=32, where a(32) = 128, while A318474(32) = 256.
